alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 5:48AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ascension, southeastern West Baton Rouge, central Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 615 AM CDT... At 548 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grosse Tete, or 9 miles west of Plaquemine, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Plaquemine, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Geismar, Inniswold, Village St. George, Shenandoah, Gardere and Carville. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 161 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
